about.text: The Ribbon Game is a scavenger hunt focused around building connections between congoers. There are many ways to obtain a ribbon‚Äîyou just have to track down dealers who have them.

about_find.text: Look for ribbon dealers in the vendor areas, watch for announcements, and talk to other collectors‚Äîribbons are meant to start conversations.

about_types.text: There are usually 5 main ways players can earn ribbons:

about_type_qa.text: To get a Q&A ribbon, you must answer a question or quiz.

about_type_achieve.text: To get an Achievement ribbon, you must complete a special task or quest.

about_type_connect.text: To get a Connection ribbon, you must meet people and strike up a conversation.

about_type_action.text: To get an Action ribbon, you need to play a game or perform an activity.

about_type_exclusive.text: To get an Exclusive ribbon, you must be at a certain time and place, wear a specific cosplay, or something similar.

about_need.text: Of course not. Collecting is free for everyone to do.

about_suppliers.text: If you would like to give out ribbons, please complete the Ribbon Update Form. Provide information like the ribbon name, how to earn it, and which days it will be available.
